messages

Class ServerResponse

  • java.lang.Object
    • messages.Response
      • messages.ServerResponse

  • public class ServerResponse
extends Response
    This class represents the server response. It always sends the whole canvas to the client. The ServerResponse extends the Response. Every response also has a projectID to specify to whom the response belongs. The class gets called everytime before the Server responses to the client.
    See Also:
    Response, RESTHandler

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ServerResponse()
      Default constructor.
      ServerResponse(java.lang.String projectID)
      The projectID gets assigned to the ServerResponse.

    • Method Detail

      • getProjectID

        public java.lang.String getProjectID()
        Returns the projectID. Gets called in createProject method in RESTHandler.
        Returns:
        returns projectID in String

      • setProjectID

        public void setProjectID(java.lang.String projectID)
        Sets the ProjectID to a new ID.
        Parameters:
        projectID - new projectID in String

      • getCanvas

        public Canvas getCanvas()
        Returns the canvas of the Response. Gets called whenever the JSON object is created to send it to the client.
        Returns:
        returns a Canvas

      • setCanvas

        public void setCanvas(Canvas canvas)
        Changes the Canvas. Gets called whenever the canvas is updated (e.g.: layer edited/deleted, shape edited/deleted).
        Parameters:
        canvas - new Canvas with new layers/shapes/parameters
